mapper.insert: INSERT INTO research (rno, rtitle, rdate1, rdate2, rstate, rop, rgdate) VALUES (#{rno}, #{rtitle}, #{rdate1}, #{rdate2}, #{rstate}, #{rop}, NOW())

INSERT INTO researchq(rno, qcont, qtype, qty) VALUES
(#{item.rno}, #{item.qcont}, #{item.qtype}, #{item.qty})
mapper.select: SELECT rno, rtitle, rdate1, rdate2, rstate, rop, rgdate FROM research ORDER BY rgdate desc
SELECT rc.qno, rc.choice FROM researchq rq JOIN researchc rc ON rq.qno = rc.qno WHERE rq.rno = #{rno} AND rq.qno = 17
